#x ranges are kept, whereas z ranges are ignored (i.e, in this example, and x between 170000 and 190000 is kept, but a z equal to 0 will be removed) 
x 158000 176000 159000 178000 156000 175000 156500 175000 158000 176000
x 268000 286000 269000 288000 266000 285000 266500 285000 268000 286000
x 378000 396000 379000 398000 376000 395000 376500 395000 378000 396000
x 488000 506000 489000 508000 486000 505000 486500 505000 488000 506000
x 598000 616000 599000 618000 596000 615000 596500 615000 598000 616000
z 0 0
#z 4000 inf
